Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class KeySignature

java.lang.Object
org.wmn4j.notation.KeySignature
public final class KeySignature extends Object
Represents a key signature.

This class is immutable.

  • Method Details

    • of

      public static KeySignature of(List<Pitch.Base> sharps, List<Pitch.Base> flats)
      Returns a key signature with the given sharps and flats. For common key signatures using the ones defined in KeySignatures is recommended. This is method is intended for creating non-standard key signatures.
      Parameters:
      sharps - the Pitch.Base names that should be raised. For example, for G-major this list consists only of Pitch.Base.F.
      flats - the Pitch.Base names that should be flattened. For example, for F-major this list consists only of Pitch.Base.B.
      Returns:
      a key signature with the given sharps and flats
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the same Pitch.Base is in both sharps and flats.
